Package rover

Class Blinker

java.lang.Object
rover.Blinker
public class Blinker
extends java.lang.Object
The Blinker static class is designed to help developers to use the leJOS' Button class more easily.
Author:
Antoine Stevan

  • Field Details

    • BLANK

      public static int BLANK
      Blank color code. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the color of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it to no color.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • GREEN

      public static int GREEN
      Green color code. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the color of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it to green.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • RED

      public static int RED
      Red color code. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the color of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it to red.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • ORANGE

      public static int ORANGE
      Orange color code. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the color of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it to orange.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • STILL

      public static int STILL
      Still LEDs speed mode. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the speed of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it 0, i.e. the LEDs do not blink and the light stays still.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • SLOW

      public static int SLOW
      Slow LEDs speed mode. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the speed of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it slow, i.e. the LEDs blink at a pretty slow pace like 'blink... blink... blink...'.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

    • FAST

      public static int FAST
      Fast LEDs speed mode. When used as a parameter in blink(int, int) or blink(int, int, int), controls the speed of the LEDs in the center of the lego brick and set it fast, i.e. the LEDs blink at a pretty fast pace like 'blink blink... blink blink...'.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int), blink(int, int, int)

  • Constructor Details

    • Blinker

      public Blinker()

  • Method Details

    • blink

      public static void blink​(int color, int mode, int ms_duration)
      Starts a blink sequence (can be a blocking method). To indicate modes or make the rover more friendly, one could want to have the LEDs blinking. Simply give blink() a color, a blink mode and a total duration. To use a simplified version of blink, see blink(int, int).
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the LEDs.
      mode - the blink/speed mode for the LEDs.
      ms_duration - the total time length of the blink sequence -> if positive, blocks following instructions until completion.
      See Also:
      blink(int, int)

    • blink

      public static void blink​(int color, int mode)
      Starts a blink sequence. To indicate modes or make the rover more friendly, one could want to have the LEDs blinking. Simply give blink() a color and a blink mode. Here, no total duration is recquired, hence blink(int, int) sets a blink mode which will run in the background until either reset(), a new blink sequence or Button.LEDPattern(0) is called.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the LEDs.
      mode - the blink/speed mode for the LEDs.

    • reset

      public static void reset()
      Resets the LEDs in the middle of the brick.
